text: Hey, we connected google analytics with our HubSpot-account, does anybody know if form submits are automatically tracked? It seems like it
<@U02094DEMTK> what do you mean with theme?
Did you purchase a website theme from the <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website|HubSpot Template Marketplace>?
let me check please, with the team
Hi. Thing is we are all pretty new in the company. Seem we didn't because we had a graphic designer to design the look and then a programer made it.
For some reason our blogs are set with a "no index" tag therefor we have only 10 out of 70ish indexed in Google
can we have someone to help us?

Yes that's it !
Do you use it to optimize the SEO of websites ?

Yes. I find it useful for identifying any missing alt text for images or content recommendations. 
But when it comes to tech warnings I rely on the original source meaning Google page speed test

Do you have any specific worries about SEO inside HubSpot <@U03016GSEQ6>?

To close the loop on the issue, in case another user has it, the layouts folder of the theme stores base template files for a theme. If a `noindex, no follow` tag is in a base file, every page made from that will include that tag. Sometimes these tags get left in during development to prevent pages from being indexed during coding.
